text:
A man, who allegedly bludgeoned nine persons to death using stones in separate incidents over an eight year period from 2007, was arrested here on Monday, the police said.

Nine persons were allegedly bludgeoned to death by Kunjumon in separate incidents from 2007 to 2015. Homeless people sleeping on the roadside were his target.

Drug addict

Kunjumon, allegedly a drug addict from Thevara near here, is alleged to have hit people on their heads with heavy stones as they woke up when he tried to rob them.

He was caught after one of his room mates — Unnikrishnan — was allegedly killed in the same manner last year.

The police said they used scientific methods, including help of psychologists and forensic officials, in cracking the case. —PTI
title: Kochi serial killer who targeted the homeless held
